events.message: I filed a claim today after my car was hit in a collision at the downtown parking lot.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to the nature of the collision damage reported.
An agent has been assigned to handle the claim and will be coordinating the process with me.
I received confirmation from the insurance company acknowledging the claim submission promptly.
The agent requested photos of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report for further processing.
Submitted all requested documents including accident report, photos of my car, and repair quotes as instructed.
The investigation into the accident details and liability is underway by the claims assessment team.
The investigation was completed with no discrepancies found, and fault has been assigned to the other driver.
Received a settlement offer from the insurance company covering the repair costs and rental car expenses.
I provided positive feedback about the timely communication and thorough support from my insurance agent.
The claim was officially approved to proceed with repairs based on the terms outlined in the settlement.
Payment was issued directly to the auto repair shop to cover the full cost of fixing the vehicle damages.
The claim was closed successfully after completing repairs and finalizing all required documentation.
The claim was archived in the system as resolved with no further actions pending or required.
